sections.title: Sorcerer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Sorcerer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Sorcerer)
sections.description: Sorcerers are proficient with all simple weapons but no armor or shields, as armor interferes with spells that have somatic components.

sections.title: Spells (Sorcerer)
sections.description: Sorcerers cast arcane spells spontaneously from a limited number of spells known, using Charisma as their spellcasting ability and can exchange known spells at even levels.

sections.title: Bloodline (Sorcerer)
sections.description: A sorcerer's magical heritage grants additional spells known, bonus feats, class skills, and special abilities based on their chosen bloodline.

sections.title: Cantrips (Sorcerer)
sections.description: Sorcerers learn 0-level spells that can be cast repeatedly without consuming spell slots.

sections.title: Eschew Materials (Sorcerer)
sections.description: Sorcerers automatically gain Eschew Materials as a bonus feat at 1st level.
